page.title: 15A RESIDENT BOREHAM NORTH 2
page.content: A Day in the life of Ann continued. Basildon is a mostly working class area, so Ann and her mother in law need to provide good quality low priced food. Ann buys her lunch from a market stall and it will consist of egg or cheese on toast. Ann leaves the stall at 5.30 and catches 2 buses back to Boreham.She enjoys half a pint of shandy at the local pub while waiting for her husband to give her a lift for the last part of the journey. Ann cooks dinner when she arives home. This might be a vegetable flan with a mixed salad.Ann likes salads with a rice base,and may include nuts and raisons.Ann and her family do not eat meat.After dinner Ann may play with her children chess, badminton computor games, or take them swimming.
